metadata.title: CVE-2023-0195 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer driver nvlddmkm.sys, where an can cause CWE-1284, whichmay lead to hypothetical Information leak of unimportant data such as localvariable data of the driver

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nvidia-graphics-drivers-304-updates: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
